FilterDatakeys¶

extremals.FilterDatakeys(data, keys=None, exclude=None)[source]¶

Filter keys from non numeric columns and data for duplicated columns.

Parameters:
  • data (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe
  • keys (list) – list of columns to use, default None: all columns used
  • exclude (list) – list of columns to exclude, default empty
Returns:

[keys, data] after the filtering
Return type:

list

Columns whose type is not in Test.numtype_list are discarded.

extremals
